attributes.action: Ban all factory farms in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Farm animals don’t deserve to live a life of torture and pain and have a right to live a life where they get to be outdoors and explore their surroundings and be free on a farm where they have a lot more space to live in and are happy instead of living in tiny cramped cages and  being tortured, they have a right to be able to live a happy and healthy life where they are not frightened for their lives every single day and living in horrible conditions
attributes.background: Shut down all factory farms that treat animals badly and don’t give them a good life. Make sure every single animal in the uk is free on a farm and is treated with respect by farmers and those who look after them. Make sure that anyone who tries to treat animals inhumanly gets prosecuted.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578999
